title: A svpport for the sinking heart in times of distresse, or, A sermon preached in London to uphold hope and allay feare Ianuary 4th which was a day of great trouble and deepe danger in the city / by Simeon Ash.
author: Ashe, Simeon, d. 1662.
publisher: Printed by G.H. and are to be sold by Thomas Vnderhill...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
